anya-e0702n10:2_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero majjhimattheraṁ cinaraṭṭhaṁ pesesi,-tvaṁ etaṁ raṭṭhaṁ gantvā ettha sāsanaṁ patiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n10:3_0: Majjhimattheroca kassapagottarena aḷakarevattherena dundabhiyattherena mahārevattherenaca saddhiṁ himavantappadese pañcacīnaraṭṭhaṁ gantvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantakathāyataṁ desaṁ pasādetvā asītipāṇakoṭiyo maggaphalaratanāni paṭilābhesi.
anya-e0702n10:6_0: Tattha kira manussā yebhuyyena candīparamīsvārānaṁ yakkhānaṁ pūjaṁ karonti.
anya-e0702n10:6_1: Teneva te pañca therā tesaṁ yakkhasenaṁ pakāsayitvā dhammaṁ desesuṁ.
anya-e0702n10:6_2: Kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṁ pana kadāci kadāci cīnaraṭṭhindassa vijitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0702n10:7_0: Cīranaṭṭhe pana bhagavato sāsanaṁ dubbalaṁyeva hutvā aṭṭhāsi, na thiraṁ hutvā.
anya-e0702n10:7_1: Teneva idāni tattha katthaciyeva sāsanaṁ chāyāmattaṁva paññāyati,
anya-e0702n10:20_0: Koci ettheva doso ce, paññāyati sucittakā;
anya-e0702n10:21_0: Taṁ khamantu ca suddhiyā, gaṇhantu yuttikaṁ haveti.
